@Michalszymansk1 The work of the UN continues around the world all day every day even when HQ offices are closed.
@Josko_Mise It's an official holiday. Work continues around the world when HQ offices are closed.
UN offices in many part of the world are closed on Friday, including UN Headquarters in NYC. No public tours or meeting will be held.
